辅助信息(ancillary information)：这个特性可用来在图像文件中存储一些文本注释信息。 独立于计算机软硬件环境。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin ancillaris, from ancilla 'maidservant'

entry.def: The ancillary workers in an institution are the people such as cleaners and cooks whose work supports the main work of the institution.
Ancillary means additional to something else.

example.ex: Ancillary charges are at least $30 per day...
example.tran: 附加收费每天至少30美元。

example.ex: Scientific development meant the growth of numerous professions ancillary to medicine.
example.tran: 科技发展意味着许多医学衍生职业的增长。

means.word_mean: 1. relating to something that is added but is not essential;

"The mind and emotions are auxilliary to each other"
